mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT m.card_no), 0) FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_maninfo m ON b.borrow_nid = m.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` > 1 AND 5 >= b.`status` ) + ( SELECT IFNULL( COUNT(DISTINCT u.username), 0 ) FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_user u ON b.borrow_nid = u.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` > 1 AND 5 >= b.`status` )

SELECT ( SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT m.card_no), 0) FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_maninfo m ON b.borrow_nid = m.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` > 1 AND 5 > b.`status` ) + ( SELECT IFNULL( COUNT(DISTINCT u.username), 0 ) FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_user u ON b.borrow_nid = u.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` > 1 AND 5 > b.`status` )
SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(a.user_id),0) FROM ht_account a WHERE a.bank_wait_capital > 0 OR a.plan_account_wait > 0

SELECT SUM(A.recover_capital_wait) FROM ( select br.id,br.recover_capital_wait FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE br.recover_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date}) and br.id not in ( select br.id FROM ht_borrow b LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_recover br ON b.borrow_nid = br.borrow_nid WHERE br.recover_time >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date}) AND br.recover_yestime <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{date}) )
) A

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tt.waitSum), 0) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(b.repay_account_capital_wait) AS waitSum FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_user u ON b.borrow_nid = u.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` = 4 GROUP BY u.username UNION ALL SELECT SUM(b.repay_account_capital_wait) AS waitSum FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_maninfo m ON b.borrow_nid = m.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` = 4 GROUP BY m.card_no ) t ORDER BY t.waitSum DESC LIMIT 1 ) tt

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tt.waitSum), 0) FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(b.repay_account_capital_wait) AS waitSum FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_user u ON b.borrow_nid = u.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` = 4 GROUP BY u.username UNION ALL SELECT SUM(b.repay_account_capital_wait) AS waitSum FROM ht_borrow b JOIN ht_borrow_maninfo m ON b.borrow_nid = m.borrow_nid WHERE b.`status` = 4 GROUP BY m.card_no ) t ORDER BY t.waitSum DESC LIMIT 10 ) tt
